description.en: ZENZO is a all-encompassing ecosystem designed specifically for gamers and game developers. The foundation is the dedicated Proof of Stake gaming blockchain, known as ZENZO Blockchain. The multi-faceted driving force within this network is the ZENZO Coin, known as ZNZ. The primary vision is to facilitate adoption and awareness of both blockchain and cryptocurrency in the gaming industry. Within the Ecosystem, there are primarily 4 different elements: ZENZO Core (Blockchain, Coin, Wallet), ZENZO Arcade (Digital Marketplace), ZENZO Forge (Scalable Mesh Network), and the ZENZO Hatchery (Game Incubator). Each one of these elements offers a unique and separate approach to solve specific problems, while supporting the other elements. To learn more about the benefits of each of these elements, please visit the official website, https://zenzo.io.

status_updates.description:
Greetings, ZENZOnites!

We are honored to announce our newest partnership with Ammobox Studios, the creators of Eximius: Seize The Frontline! With this partnership, we are expanding our relationships deeper into the world of indie games and happy to support great indie game developers and communities.

Read the full article:
https://zenzo-ecosystem.medium.com/new-partnership-zenzo-ammobox-studios-7a66d5786903

Greetings, ZENZOnites!

ZENZO has released its first NFT Standard, referred to as the ZFI-1. This first standard is for unique, immalleable, indivisible tokens that proposes a stable, universal protocol for items with traits that cannot be copied. These ZENZO NFTs were coined “ZENZO Forge Items” or “ZFIs”, as they directly relate to the ZENZO Forge and the concept of an item is easier to grasp than an nft. 

https://zenzo-ecosystem.medium.com/a-new-nft-standard-emerges-zfi-1-e09e701b4729

Greetings, ZENZOnites!

The moment you have all been waiting for is finally here...

The ZENZO Forge and KOTA Demos are now live! Scalable solutions to blockchain gaming, we welcome you!

Learn more about the ZENZO Forge and KOTA + the step-by-step guide on how to set everything up:
https://zenzo-ecosystem.medium.com/beginners-guide-zenzo-core-forge-kota-demo-a722748d38cf

Be sure to join the official ZENZO Discord, if you have any questions:
https://discord.com/invite/kwBD3pk

Greetings, ZENZOnites!

We have just released the ZENZO Monthly Report for November 2020!

- ZENZO Core v2.1.0 Release
- ZENZO Forge Development
- ZENZO Arcade Development
- KOTA Development (Blockchain Game)
- DEX Listing (BlockDX)
- The Checkpoint Recap (Level 12)

Read the full report -> https://zenzo-ecosystem.medium.com/zenzo-monthly-report-november-2020-9326eeb832bb

Greetings, ZENZOnites!

We have just released the latest ZENZO Core Wallet v2.1.0! This is a non-mandatory, but highly recommended update. Here's how to update:

1. Download
2. Delete old client
3. Run new client

That simple!

Download ZENZO Core v2.1.0 | Kiyori:
https://github.com/ZENZO-Ecosystem/ZENZO-Core/releases/tag/v2.1.0

Read the full release article:
https://zenzo-ecosystem.medium.com/zenzo-core-v2-1-0-kiyori-release-non-mandatory-update-19ce5efe7099

Greetings, ZENZOnites!

We are both happy and honored to announce the newest advisor to the ZENZO Ecosystem, Hans Koning!

Hans is well-known for his contributions to DigiByte and the current Chair of the DigiByte Foundation. He will be helping specifically with governance and community engagement. We are looking forward to many great times ahead...

Please be sure to give him a warm welcome on Twitter!
https://twitter.com/zenzo_ecosystem/status/1302931010191896577

Greetings, ZENZOnites!

About a week after the major milestone release of ZENZO Core v2.0 | Kiyori, we just released the latest version that has a handful of improvements and minor bug fixes. This update is highly recommended and super easy to update. 

1. Download
2. Delete old client
3. Run new client

That simple!

Download ZENZO Core v2.0.1 | Kiyori Patch #1:
https://github.com/ZENZO-Ecosystem/ZENZO-Core/releases/tag/v2.0.1
